page.description: Displays the Find and Replace dialog.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.FIND_AND_REPLACE() method displays the Find and Replace dialog box. If the form has Change mode restricted, then only the Find tab appears.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.find_and_replace()
